divs: sighting details[link moved to fi section\cms\tg] ufo sighting sherman oaks, ca filmed by eric adamo new years 12:06am corner of allott & chandler. there were 3, one after the other. the 1st one i didnt film, the 2nd one is this video and the 3rd one i had in my view finder, but all i got was a blank sky. the aliens must have been blocking me from filming it!! to the naked eye, it was the dark eerie red the same as i saw in july and of course bigger. the noise in the background is noise from passing cars on chandler. the ufo was silent, made no noise. it came from the north heading south, low on the horizon then went straight up to astronomical altitudes as you can see in the video.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 5 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around January 1st 2012
